sentences.en: Britain's customary stoicism had been overwhelmed by raw, unbridled grief.
sentences.cn: 大不列颠那惯有的沉着冷静被一种原始, 已经失去的悲痛所淹没.

sentences.en: But now he and Han Dan cried with unbridled joy.
sentences.cn: 但这一次,他和韩丹无拘无束快乐地叫了起来.

sentences.en: However , in certain quarters unbridled attacks were made at that time.
sentences.cn: 若干方面,当时曾肆意攻击,以为迟了.

sentences.en: I was amazed at their unbridled glee.
sentences.cn: 他们那兴高采烈的痛快劲儿真让我吃惊.

sentences.en: In my happy time, I was accompanied by unbridled laughter.
sentences.cn: 在我开心的时候, 陪我一起肆无忌惮的笑.

sentences.en: Laughed for a very very presumptuous kind of unbridled.
sentences.cn: 笑了很放肆很放肆的那种.

sentences.en: Memories have been in unbridled spread.
sentences.cn: 回忆一直在肆无忌惮的蔓延。

sentences.en: My burning , unbridled youth doesn't agree I stop love you!
sentences.cn: 我狂热的青春不允许我停止爱你!

sentences.en: Never has there been such unbridled license among the scholars.
sentences.cn: 学子们这样的越轨行为真是见所未见.

sentences.en: Since then, the MDC has been the victim of unbridled retaliation.
sentences.cn: 此后, MDC成为肆意报复的牺牲品.

sentences.en: The invading troops displayed the most unbridled license.
sentences.cn: 入侵军队胡作非为到了极点.

sentences.en: The reactionary elements have been unbridled in their attacks.
They exemplify the unbridled ferocity of the protoss at war.
sentences.cn: 他们诠释了神族在战争中那无边无际的愤怒的力量.

sentences.en: This unbridled energy does not always make him an ideal family pet.
sentences.cn: 这种过于旺盛的精力使它并不总是能成为理想的家庭宠物.

sentences.en: You are attracted to those who are unbridled , untrammeled, and free.
sentences.cn: 你容易被那些逍遥不羁的人所吸引.

words.tran_cn: 放肆的；无拘束的；激烈的

trans.tran_cn: （马等）无辔头的，不受约束的，不受控制的，放纵的
trans.tran_en: not controlled and too extreme or violent

trans.tran_cn: 放纵（unbridle的过去分词形式）；卸下马辔头
